import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import './About.css' import Nav from './Nav' class About extends Component { render() { return (
<  about  />
DESIGNED @:

Northwestern University
EECS352 - Machine Perception of Audio
Prof. Bryan Pardo
Spring, 2019
This project was designed for multiple user groups. First, we considered the up and coming music student: passionate about composition, but still learning the fundamentals of theory and chordal structure. Melodi provides these students with teh ability to harmonize their compositions and continue to learn and experiment, even with a limited knowledge base. Second, we considered experienced professional composers who routinely perform harmonization and orchestration tasks that require mundane adn repititive chordal analysis. Harmoni provides this user group with the automation to accelerate their workflow and avoid brute work to focus on creativity.
